website_summaries.verdict: Elegant spin on the classic ballet flat that comes in a range of finishes and colors.
pros: Super comfortable with moderate arch support and cushioned insole
Looks good with jeans yet smart enough for business attire
More pointed than a ballet flat, which is flattering on the foot
cons: Front of the shoe is not roomy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to Love these
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to Love these. Initially ordered a 7.5 which was WAY too big. Returned and bought the 7 which was still a tad big and once I wore them all day they stretched a tad more. I have somewhat of a wide foot but not wide enough to have to buy "wide" shoes. These however are cut weird at the front causing blisters on my toes on BOTH sides. Halfway through the day I had blisters on the back of my foot and on both sides of the front. The cushion is comfortable and better then most flats but the overall comfort is a NO for me. These shoes are terribly uncomfortable all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: MICHSIMM33

customer_reviews.title: If you buy cheap flats STOP!! Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is PERFECT! Was sick of cheap flats that cracked or tore, so I bought these because they were real leather and highly reviewed. I was afraid it would look dowdy (I'm 24 and I really don't want it to age me) but it's quite stylish, and SOO comfortable. This shoe is heaven. I wish it came in more colors, because right now I wear it nearly every day. Since it IS real leather, make sure to clean, condition, and protect it to really really get the most out of your purchase. This is definitely worth it, and you will save a lot of money when you're not buying $10 flats every few months...
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are amazing! i absolutelly love them
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are amazing ! i absolutelly love them. Bocause i had a car accident a couple of years ago, i have to be very conceus about the shoes i wear. This are the most confortable shoes i have had in a long time. If i could give them an extra star i would. They fit perfectlly. They're gorgeus, beautiful material, inside and out. I feel i can wear them with anything, anytime. The color is 99% close to what you can see in the picture. I have tried some other products of this brand, they are all great quality products. Hope you enjoy them as much as me : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basic black ballet flats - must be broken in!
customer_reviews.text: These are not "wear right out of the box" as some reviewers mentioned. I had to work into these and wear them for short bouts of time to break them in (also put socks on and vacuumed the house in them). But once you break them in, they are very comfortable and the memory foam insole is really nice to have in a ballet flat. They do fit as expected, and I am really happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the full price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for almost a year now, I wear them a few times a week at work. I'm not as happy with them as I'd hope to be. I made a point to buy a leather shoe to hopefully get more than a year out of them compared to the $10-$15 Gap flats I normally buy. The Leather on the toe showed wear fast, the insert and arch support was not as comfortable as hoped, and the sole split along the lines located under the ball of your foot. All in all, I would not say the shoe is worth its full price tag of $50-$60.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: Try On Immediately
customer_reviews.text: Quality of shoe: 5 Stars Sizing: Exactly as sized, 5 Stars Materials used: 5 Stars Design of shoe: ZERO Stars I never leave poor reviews, but I am extremely disappointed in this shoe. A man HAD to design it, and didn’t use a real-life model. You know those shoes that cut right across the fold of your toes, so that the shoe cuts into the top of your foot just behind the big toe? That’s the way these shoes do. I don’t have wide or weird shaped feet, so they’re simply a poor design. I threw the box away, so I can’t even send them back. I wasted $40. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen Mother

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy flat. Lots of padding inside. Not too pointy, not too round. The leopard pair that I purchased are an actual cow fur texture; very soft. Looking forward to running through airports on business trips with these.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Cause BAD odor!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes when I first received them, but have now discovered that after wearing them only FIVE times spread over two months, they smell HORRIBLE - this isn't something I have a problem with in other shoes. If it wasn't for the fact that they appeared new, I would absolutely think someone with a severe foot odor problem had worn them for a month and returned them. Something is seriously wrong with the material inside these shoes to cause this, and I only wish I was still within the return window. I would NOT recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Sharing Experience

customer_reviews.title: COOL Fit - EXCELLENT comfortable, stylish FLAT!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Ladies per your reviews I gave them a whirl, they are extremely comfortable. Absolutely PERFECT! I wear a 10 it was a smudge big but since my feet swell in the Summer Size 10 will be perfect. I had been needing to replace my previous Leopard print flats, so I bought these because they were real leather and highly reviewed and it's quite stylish, and SOO comfortable. My only regret was not buying other colors.
customer_reviews.author: FiveStarAMA

customer_reviews.title: These tore up one heel and side of big toe with short wear
customer_reviews.text: This may just be an adjustment period, but these shoes ate my right heel even though they are definitely the right size if not a little big (which is better for your feet with pointed shoes anyway). I was in so much pain walking back from a doctor's appt with these I wanted to take them off. They also left blisters on the outsides of both big toes. I added moleskins to both areas but haven't worked up the courage to try them again. They are very cute though and look great with a lot of things so I'm hoping they will break in some.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Was really bummed.
customer_reviews.text: I planned to use these to wear through Arlington cemetery for a work trip with a gaggle of middle schoolers and sadly these need to be broken in before use and are narrow (though I do have wide feet). I ended up wearing sneakers with a skirt and accepting that I looked ridiculous. Overall I think if I had broken them in it would have been okay but didn’t work for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Stein

customer_reviews.title: Better than your cheap flats
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to wear the bottom of my feet do not hurt anymore. The issue I have is I am a true 7 and they are a big loose so my heels slide and now I have some pretty bad blisters. I had to get a insert for the back of the shoe so it wont rub any more. I got the memory foam cool fit one. Didn't keep my feet cool. If you need decent flats I would still suggest these. I needed a new pair because the bottom of my feet were killing me. These worked out. Just hate the breaking in period and the cool fit thing that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty & good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying to find the right leather flats and discovered they all run small so it didn't bother me that these also did. I also would have preffered a pointier toe, but they are overall still pretty and good quality. I like the brown hue a lot and the soles are super comfy. The reason I took away a star is because the sharpness around the edges, as mentioned in other comments. It's luckily not as severe on my feet; just a tiny area in front that I can fix with some clear medical tape when I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SHOE, AND LONG WEARING
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe, but have not been able to purchase it again in my size. Should have purchased more than 1 pair. These are one of the best shoes, everyday shoes I have purchased for the money. I am still wearing them. They are great looking shoes, they dress up or down. I have been waiting for my size 7.5 medium to be available again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sides, the back, will most likely eat say at your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Oh man. Amazon thank you for he convenience and understanding, ya'll have been awesome. I ordered this shoe in my size, one size larger, then again in my size in wide and again in a different material- this shoe JUST WONT FIT. I need to explain that so the you know I really wanted to live and have this shoe, I would have bought two different ones even, but I agree with her girl's review before mines. The back and the sides will eat into your feet. There's no breakin them in either. uugghhhh. I gave them two stars for design and the foam comfort. The fit is awful....so close!
customer_reviews.author: Flirp

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 8W - still too narrow around toes
customer_reviews.text: I really don't want to return this item but I think I'm going to have to. I ordered an 8W but it is still too narrow around the toes. I only wore them for a few minutes around the house and they already started giving me blisters. Both around the toes and at the heels. These are so cute! I'm so sad about this. I ordered the Nude Patent color and the shoes are so cute, just extremely and unbearably uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous disappointment, shoes arrived & I immediately tried to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous disappointment, shoes arrived & I immediately tried to put them on, far too small for my foot. I typically wear a 9.5 wide shoe, sometimes a 10 in wide. I'm not sure if I wasn't paying attention to the size when I ordered, had a lapse in memory, or simply saw a pair of black flats that I liked & needed asap. Unfortunately, I was busy with work/life and forgot to return them, so now I have shoes that don't fit. Other than choosing the wrong the size, the shoes appear to be a well made with a memory foam insole (my feet would love that!). The quest for a simple black flat dress shoe that fits.. continues.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Good qualify for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and good quality for the price. The only thing I didn't like is that the cushion inside makes the shoe to fit a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: 3dega1

customer_reviews.title: ... that I stopped wearing fast because they were so painful, but then I broke them in and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these before that I stopped wearing fast because they were so painful, but then I broke them in and they were great. I ordered these from amazon and they hurt just like the firstpair. What I do is put on a pair of thick fuzzy socks to help me stretch them out. I wear a 6.5 regular. These cut me at the back of the ankle and on my small toe knuckle, after you break them in I suggest always wearing no show socks.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix87

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit perfectly and are so comfortable. They have a padded insole which makes walking on hard surfaces easier and the styling is really nice - not cheap looking at all. I'm going to buy more of this style in other colors. Just a basic flat - toe is not rounded or pointed, just sort of almond shaped, some are leather and some cloth and some are artificial, depending on the color chosen.
customer_reviews.author: kathy2d2

customer_reviews.title: very cute flats
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are really cute. i have lost weight and my shoe size has gone from wide to medium. these fit well, only where the front end of the shoe ends hits right on the widest point of my foot, at the knuckle leading to my big toe, it rubs a little. i am wearing them around the house to break them in before i wear them all day at work. possibly might have to take them to be professionally stretched, but i kinda doubt it. they are really cute and appear well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Middle aged nerd

customer_reviews.title: Cute Comfortable Flat
customer_reviews.text: I had looked for this shoe for months, being a very picky person. I wanted a shoe with an almond-shape toe but most of what's out there is very round-toed. I wear a 10 wide, so I feel it minimizes my feet as much as possible, and I just find it more visually pleasing. Very nice leather, I have them in saddle tan and black. Very comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews! These shoes hurt
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hurt!!! They are comfortable as far as support and cushion but the way they are cut they caused horrible blisters on my pinky toes. I wore them with and without socks and I had the same issue. They did hurt a little less with the footie but nonetheless they still hurt. I am so disappointed because if it weren't for them cutting into my toe and causing blisters these would have been a really good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Candy A.

customer_reviews.title: Hurts. Very uncomfortable. Trust the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Trust the reviews. These were so uncomfortable and had no give in the heel (not a flexible material) meaning they really didn’t stretch much. They hurt so badly sitting down in an office (not even walking). I am normally around 8.5. I bought both 8.5 and 9. 9 was too loose and 8.5 was too tight. If the 9 was slightly smaller I probably still wouldn’t keep them. Returned both
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the shoe seems to be made well, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: the shoe seems to be made well, but the toe area is way too tight. i think the memory foam liner is taking up too much space. i am going to try and put a shoe stretch in to see if the foam breaks down and i can get my foot in. i usually wear a 7M with no problems in other shoes. There is toe cleavage also which i am not fond of either.
customer_reviews.author: FH

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but NOT comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, the pattern is exactly what I was looking for and look great, but they are NOT comfortable. The cushion inside the shoe feels great, but the shoe digs into both heel and toes, causing redness and blisters. I'll probably keep them and just wear them on days when I don't have a lot of walking to do. It's a shame I can't wear them for more occasions, but the discomfort is really not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a big disappointment. With a name like Dr. Scholl's you'd think they would be comfortable but they are not. When I first started wearing them they were so painful and rubbed my heels badly, I could only wear them with bandaids. This went on for at least 6 months. Finally, I was able to break them in a little bit (or perhaps, my heel just became calloused enough). Once broken in, the sole has almost completely fallen out. I knew when I purchased them that they would not be leather and am not usually bothered by that, but the material on these feels exceptionally cheap. Definitely not worth the $40. Or even $10 for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne I Perez

customer_reviews.title: Refunded 1 of 3. Followed directions. UPS said do w 1 label so it costs you less is correct way.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these items, for my mom and me for xmas. Super large for me. Cut the tops of my mom's toes on her 2 different pair. The UPS guy insisted on 1 label for 3 items. Now, I am only credited for one. Written several ti.es. Called. They blew me off and nabbed over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 which I love because of the cushion and style but there were ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a dramatic size difference between the 6 and 6.5 in these shoes. I have previously purchased a 6.5 which I love because of the cushion and style but there were too big. My feet slip out of the shoes if i walk too fast or have my foot moving off the ground. However, this time when I purchased the size 6 they are too small. They are very tight and I wore them for a small amount of time trying to see if they would stretch out any and ended up with some massive blisters. When in doubt, go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: RM88

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff in the heel
customer_reviews.text: These shoes gave me the BIGGEST blister on the back of my heel. The size fits OK everywhere else but these are not comfortable at all and I haven't been able to wear them more than once. Going to have to get them professionally stretched if I ever wear them again=/
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Salinas

customer_reviews.title: I've tried wearing them with socks and they're good enough to keep
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5 or 8 in shoes. I ordered both the 7.5 and 8 in these and the 7.5s are way too small and these are way too big. I've tried wearing them with socks and they're good enough to keep, but I wish they weren't so stiff. I've been having trouble breaking them in and because they're not quite the right size, they're harder to walk in and the toes are getting a bit scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I was at first a little skeptical about them but not anymore. They are so comfortable and the pointy toe is not constricting at all (not really pointy pointy more of an almond toe). Very comfortable. The day I received these shoes I was wearing my other pointy toe flats and could not wait to get them off when I opened the box I put these on right away and they felt like slippers compared to the ones I was wearing. Buy these flats! PS. I purchased the black/leopard calf hair style and they look much more expensive then the $50 price tag (and match everything!)
customer_reviews.author: gStar

customer_reviews.title: Most painful shoe I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these shoes to work. I live in San Diego and I walk less than a mile to work. The shoes arrived and when I first tried them on I thought they were very cute. However, wearing them just on the short walk to work DESTROYED my feet. I had about six blisters from the small toe box and the backs of the shoes. I was hobbling around the office for the rest of the day. I am going to stick with Rothys or Cole Haan. Never again Dr. Scholls - the Doctor was not doing quality assurance on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love the comfort of these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Dr. Scholl's leopard flats that I have purchased. I liked the first pair so much, that I wore them out. I also bought this style of Dr. Scholl's in several other colors. Great for long days of walking. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Warm Fuzzies

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too long!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes, but wow they run large! I normally wear an 8 in flats and a 7.5 in heels, but I ordered an 8 in these and couldn't keep them on when walking. I'm so sad, since the 8's at about $14 and the 7.5 is $70. Clearly, I won't be reordering them given that significant price difference. But other than that, they seemed comfortable and have some cushioning (more so than many flats). Would recommend, but would advise sizing down.
customer_reviews.author: Joiciatou

customer_reviews.title: Falls Short of Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of these shoes. They are comfortable, fashionable, and practical. However, they gape at the sides. They don't fit "like a glove" and that may steer you away from them. As for me, when they arrived and I tried them on I initially was going to return them because of the gaping but loved the texture and overall comfort of the shoe that I ended up keeping them. I do however wish they didn't gape as they do.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly impossible to break in. This shoe was designed in the strangest way. Very stiff in the heel which caused awful blisters. Even started to wear through blister bandages. If you don't have very, very narrow feet you could try the wide widths but I'll bet your heels will still pay the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and typical Dr. Scholl’s quality. If this is actual leather as it state sim the shoe, it’s very low quality split leather, nothing to pay extra for. I typically wear an 8.5 or 9 in other brands, but always a 9 in Dr. Scholls and these were no different. Sadly these didn’t work for me, because I have a boney big toe joint/beginning of a bunion, and the way this shoe is cut it went just below/across that joint and was uncomfortable, not to mention, unattractive.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Gave me terrible blisters
customer_reviews.text: These shoes gave me terrible blisters. They never broke in, even though they seemed to fit fine. After several days with blisters, I finally gave up on them. I wish I had tossed them on the first day! Ironic to have blisters all over my feet from Dr. Scholl's products!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect black flat - Runs half size big
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flats ever, and I am on my third pair. SO glad I found them after years of searching for the perfect everyday black flat. I wear them in black (not the shiney patent black) and they are the perfect work shoe in a business casual environment. Very comfortable and cute, I can wear them all day long, and they do wear well. Perfect shape with the pointed toe, but not too pointy. I do size down a half size - normally a 9.5, but wear a 9 in this shoe. I also wear with a black no-show sock. I can't say enough good things about these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flat
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago I tried these on DSW but didn't buy them because of the price. I found them here on Amazon for less AND they had a coupon code I could use. Nice steal. I really liked them to wear inflight (I'm a flight attendant) they're comfortable but I'm still waiting on them to give a bit. I wear a 10 but in my flats I buy a 9.5. I absolutely recommend sizing down because they are too big & will also give in the more you wear them. I like the simple style & they are Really comfortable to wear at work or during my layovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shoe. I have re-bought these shoes at least four times. They last me about a year, with heavy use. They are sooo comfortable and oh so cute. The mohair does where off overtime, but that is to be expected. I have tried numerous alternatives, but I keep coming back to this one. Its a bit pricey but completely worth it for the quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia W

customer_reviews.title: Nice just nice
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of ballet flats as an adult that doesn't have anything to do with ballet, well if you don't count watching the Nutcracker at Christmas time. They are cute and the material is nice. I find myself rubbing them quite often. They do run a little big. Being the big spender I am, I invested in a pair of those rubbery cusion ball of foot things and fixed that issue right up....and now I'm the proud owner of another pair of shoes my husband can complain about.
customer_reviews.author: evilruler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flat
customer_reviews.text: Really love this shoe! I wanted an animal print but most flats I found were flimsy and overpriced. This was a great price for Dr. Scholl's. There is great cushioning, I can definitely stand and walk in these shoes throughout my work day, but the heel backing is pretty stiff and caused excessive rubbing so I still have to wear bandaids to prevent the skin from tearing. I have no doubt I will break them in soon, and for the style and fit I have no complaints! Also- they were true to size, I am a 9.5 in most flats and that was the case with these.
customer_reviews.author: EvilKittty

customer_reviews.title: Too painful to wear in
customer_reviews.text: In almost every other style of shoe a 8 is the right size for me, but these pinched horribly at the sides to the point that I could only try them on for a few seconds. I'm not sure if they would have fit better after some wear due to the "memory foam" but unfortunately it hurt too much to wait and find out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Burditt

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are good, not my favorite and not as comfortable as I feel like they should be. The top part needs to cover more of the toes. It has a good cushion on the bottom though, and it fits the bill of simple, black flats. Just wish it was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased about 4 of these from here and I love them. Although flat, they're cushioned, so they're very comfortable. I've worn these nearly every day for several months and I've had no issues with quality. They fit as expected (I'm a size 11), but if you have a very wide foot,you may want to consider something else.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: I love Dr. Scholl's Really Flats
customer_reviews.text: I love Dr. Scholl's Really Flats! They are pointy but not too pointy. I am a teacher so I am on my feet all day and these flats are very comfortable. I read the previous reviews and ordered half a size down. I've bought these flats in nude, camel, and 2 in brown/black leopard. The ones I wear the most are definitely the leopard print. Which is why I have bought them twice. I wear them rotten! They go with absolutely everything I wear and I am complimented on them all the time. I am very satisfied with this product and will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: KeriKid

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for Mr right (and left)
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this shoe, I needed to like this shoe. I walk over 20k steps per day and need a professional shoe that will protect my joints. Flats are frumpy but knee replacement is forever. Tried 6.5, the toe is too tight and the back is too stiff. The 7 was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The support and padding in the shoe is great, which is why I kept them
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I am keeping them because I need a basic black flat, but I feel you can tell they are man-made material looking at them. The support and padding in the shoe is great, which is why I kept them. I am on my feet a lot at work, so I need a comfortable flat. They might lean a little matronly in style/appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I had to give up wearing high heels to work because of an upcoming foot surgery. These shoes are stylish and dressy enough for the office. They are also very comfortable, although I wish they had more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Merlot

customer_reviews.title: Now they are so comfortable. Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and extremely sensitive skin. Can't wear heels anymore and wanted something cute and stylish. I needed to wear these around the house for a few hours a day for a week for them to adapt to my foot. Now they are so comfortable. Love them. Plan of getting other colors.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend at all. The style or fit of the shoe is TERRIBLE. I tried everything to make the fit more comfortable (ordered a size up, a size down, my size) and NONE of them fit comfortably. The curved part where your toes would hit will squeeze and bruise your toes. Hands down one of the worst fitting shoes I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Chantae

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is the problem!
customer_reviews.text: They are very cushy, but no arch support. They also say to order a 1/2 size smaller, as they run large. I ordered both my regular size and the size smaller. The smaller one had my big toe down in the point and my regular size is a little loose. I am adding an arch support and a heel gripper to make them work for my daughters wedding. The shoe looks to be of good quality and nice dark navy, it's just the fit is either too small or a little large. Sure wish they would make the sizes correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cohnen

customer_reviews.title: Pointy little leather flats.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice flats! My feet are a fairly regular width, but I ordered wide just to be on the safe side, and I'm glad that I did. They hurt my feet for the first couple days while I was wearing them in, but now they're very comfortable. Nice looking, real leather flats, look great with leggings, jeans, dresses, just about everything. My go-to office shoes!
customer_reviews.author: kpcrescentTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: These are fairly comfortable and fit as expected/true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly comfortable and fit as expected/true to size. However, the top part cuts into my skin a bit, particularly on the outsides. I don't have wide feet or anything, I just think the cut hits me in a weird spot. I'm hoping that kind of softens out since the rest of the shoe is great. Also, the shoes are lighter than I anticipated, almost like white linen, but I'll make them work...
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, too small, not slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8 but ordered an 8.5 because Dr. Scholl's tend to run small. They were still too tight across my toes, and I do not have a wide foot. I work in a restaurant and go them to wear at work. Halfway through my shift I had blisters on my heels and could barely walk because the bottoms and sides of my feet ached so much. Also, these are not slip resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: My go to shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. My dog chewed my first pair. Loved them so much I had to buy another! Wear with slacks, jeans, skirt, mini dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Plauger

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but VERY uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but VERY uncomfortable. I've worn these shoes for three separate 20-min walks to work and am now giving them away. These shoes are super firm (to the point of being uncomfortable) and give me blisters at both the back of my heel and by my big toe at the edge of the rim. Ouch! The pad is soft but definitely doesn't make up for the stiffness of the rest of the shoe which makes the wear unbearable. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes its not the shoe
customer_reviews.text: For people with fairly normal feet these wouldbe a great by. I wish l could wear them. However they hit my foot near my big toe in the wrong place. Its not the shoe its my foot.
customer_reviews.author: PMiz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product expected better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter after she tried them on in a shoe store, unfortunately she was very disappointed. Shoes came as order and she wore them to school all day and came home sore & unhappy. She ended up with blisters and they irritated the back of her feet and after one days wear she has scuffs and scratches on the shoes. Will be returning them tomorrow as we both expected better from Dr Scholl's I don't foresee them lasting long if this is after one day's wear! Very disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. MVS

customer_reviews.title: Look great but too painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's feet are different, and these shoes rub against the knobs of my feet. I tried to break them in but it was too painful. I can't return them and I can't wear them. They look great though, and I wish they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need plain black flats - buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of black flats and these totally fit the bill. This was my first time ordering shoes from Amazon and I was a little nervous, but I read the reviews and saw how the sizes ran and I took a chance. I'm so glad I did. They fit as expected and I was happy they came in a wide width. The insoles are very comfortable and for the price, you can't do much better, especially with a trusted name like Dr. Scholl's.
customer_reviews.author: Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought them late January and already falling apart. The shoe is pretty, but not the comfort I was hoping for. Maybe I need a size up but the flopped around and I had to put something in the heel to keep them in place and avoid heel blisters but I still get blisters everytime I wear them in other spots now. I haven't worn them for about a month since I found more comfortable shoes I can wear for work. I put them on again early this week and by the end of the day my feet hurt, the inside sole was coming up, and parts of the shoe had worn onto the bottom of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable. I teach and am on my feet much ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit exactly as I had hoped/expected. I couldn't really answer the part about arch support. They are flat shoes and I don't really need any arch support so it is difficult to judge. These shoes are so comfortable. I teach and am on my feet much of the day; I don't even notice I am wearing these. Also the leather upper is soft and easy to clean. The toe is pointy which is nicely attractive but does not squeeze anywhere. I usually need a big toe box for my long wide feet, but the pointy toe feels good and looks pretty. A nice change from the big wide shoes I usually need to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Babs Caltrain

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these shoes - I wore the last pair out until multiple friends told me I needed new ones :) The first ones were comfortable pretty much immediately. This new pair is noticeably different in fit and color -- it's darker pattern than pictures! And a little snug. I'm going to keep them anyway but am a little disappointed with the inconsistency.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J.

customer_reviews.title: Toe cleavage!
customer_reviews.text: These were a little longer and wider than I thought they would be, and the toe doesn't cover all of my toes so I walk around with a peek of "toe cleavage" towards my little toe. Also, they are a little stiff when they first arrive, so you have to break them in a little. Once they are broken in, they are comfortable and feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: emf

customer_reviews.title: Comfort ALL day long!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. Couldn't handle paying what most retailers want for a simple leopard print flat. Crazy prices out there! But these are definitely worth the money AND are comfortable enough to wear all day and anywhere! But I will say that although they are so, so comfortable, if I were to order another pair I would size down a half size. They definitely stretched a little, but not so much that I'll not wear them.
customer_reviews.author: sscvillemom

customer_reviews.title: Best Looking Office Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: I went to four different stores looking for comfortable office shoes--that did not look like clunky orthopedics--and these were exactly what I was looking for. Comfortable enough to wear on your feet all day; goes with a wide variety of outfits. Bought two pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: Cute Animal Print in Leopard
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, the toes are a little more pointed than they look in the picture to me but they are still cute. They are comfortable so far wearing In the house, the insoles have some cushion I was hoping for more. Animal prints are hard to find these days so these will probably work for those of you who have great feet and can wear shoes without very much support.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Johnson

customer_reviews.title: More salmon than pink/ berry
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, but I was expecting it to be more pink than salmon color. I ordered a half size larger than normal b/c of the reviews that said they rubbed the heal. I'm glad I did b/c they fit perfectly. The padding insole is so comfortable. I would give them 5 stars but sometimes when I walk the front of the shoe indents at the big toe and rubs against my toe. I'm not sure if this is because I have a 1/2 size to big but it isn't that big of a deal that I don't want to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very uncomfortable material it’s a hard material. Will cause blisters within an hour
customer_reviews.author: tkeziah

customer_reviews.title: I'm a size 9 in almost all brands and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 9 in almost all brands and this is very true to size. As expected from Dr. Scholls, these were super-comfortable right away. I'm a teacher and spend about 8 hours a day on my feet, and these held up! Thinking about getting another pair in black soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did get a refund so I'm fine, but if you have wide feet don't get ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet can barely find 9.5 that fit me so I buy size 10, sometimes they fit sometimes they are too big. This where not the same shoe I ordered, since I have those shoes, but I tried them anyways to see if they fit and they are too narrow for me. I did get a refund so I'm fine, but if you have wide feet don't get them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathia

customer_reviews.title: I really like these, they are my new favorites
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, they are my new favorites. They are comfortable and look really cute, if you like the look of toe cleavage. At the widest part of the feet (at the base of the big and little toes) the shoes rubbed at first, but after a couple days it was fine. I walked for a few hours a day in this shoe for a week and they were definitely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CryHTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: They hurt your feet
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfortable shoe. Fit my foot but the design hits the Achilles in a way that hurts and rubs a red spot. Not much better after multiple wears (i.e. breaking in the shoe does not help the problem). Also, cool comfort, my foot. The shoe gets hot like any shoe, but traps in the heat and moisture so bad that it causes major foot odor problems. Would not recommend this shoe to others, but have to wear it. Bought it to have professional flats for work while in my third trimester. Not very professional to be walking funny because how they hurt the back of your heel.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Blisters🙄
customer_reviews.text: These have a soft insole but are so stiff they will take some breaking in. I have to wear bandaids at every pressure point on my feet or can expect a blister every time. Have worn them twice so far because it’s such a chore to put bandaids all over my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Problem Feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! As a twenty something with difficult post-op feet, it's sometimes difficult to find supportive shoes that don't make me look like I raided my grandmother's closet. These are fashionable, classic, and ridiculously comfortable! I must confess that I found myself randomly wearing them around the house because it's like walking on a cloud. They are a little long on me but the width is perfect, however my feet are slightly wide. I wish I could afford more but I'm on a college student's budget so these will get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: heartlucy13

customer_reviews.title: Terrible heel back!  Hard and instant blisters
customer_reviews.text: I had horrible blisters on both heels from wearing them a day. I even took them off at my desk and I spend most of my day seated. I won’t wear them again. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: jamieand4boys

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the cost, coming from someone who hates spending more than $20 on flats. They're really well made and comfortable (though they're flats so they don't have a TON of arch support). I wish I hadn't ordered half a size down though, as recommended by other reviews. Maybe just because my foot is too wide, but they are a bit snug. It's not too bad though so I'm hoping either the memory foam flattens or the upper stretches out a bit. Overall, love them.
customer_reviews.author: evd

customer_reviews.title: Stick to the leather varities as to avoid cuts...
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe model...I have five pairs of these "Really" flats now. This Smoke Harmony Stripe color is nice, kinda beachy, from a distance it looks like an off white. They are a bit stiff though, not as flexible as the leather, and unfortunately they chewed up the back of my heels, drawing blood, when I went for a walk in them... so I suggest getting the leather varieties of this shoe and avoiding the stiffer fabric ones.
customer_reviews.author: MissMauvelous

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size (7.5) and tried to break them in by wearing the them with thick socks around the house. The next day I wore them my ankles were torn up after walking less than a mile. I'm hoping to stretch them out so I can wear them since I've damaged the soles and wouldn't feel right returning them. At least the sole is nicely cushioned. I probably should've ordered an 8.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: These shoes hurt, listen to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd give these a try (despite poor reviews) since they are dr. scholls. They hurt SO MUCH. The toes are too tight, they fit at a weird spot that makes my upper toes bulge out, and the heels are very painful. The toes I thought I could live with but the heal hits so high that it digs into the back of my ankle and makes every step hurt, not to mention the blisters I have on my lower heal. I missed the return window by 2 days so I guess I'm stuck trying to break these in...
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but ouch
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of this shoe, but the comfort isn’t quite what I expected from this brand. I ended up with a blister on my heel, and I don’t think it’s an issue of the shoe needing to be broken in - they just hit me at the wrong spot. Sadly, these will be going into the donate pile - hopefully they can work better for someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I was looking for an everyday pair of shoes and these are super comfortable and I wear them almost everyday to work. They do seem to be falling apart quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce

customer_reviews.title: Fits slightly small and it gave me terrible blisters
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have purchased a replacement pair of flats, however a short walk later I had bloody blisters on my heels. Three weeks later and only just healed, I tried them them again. If not for sitting most of the time I was wearing them, I would have repeated the first experience. I'm so disappointed. I continue to try to break them in with socks, but I find the fit is slightly smaller than average and it quickly becomes intolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my normal size of 8 and these were ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal size of 8 and these were a bit too tight and uncomfortable. After 5 minutes of walking around the house, they started to really hurt. I'm exchanging for the next size up to see if that helps at all. They are very cute and seem to have a lot of support, so I'll re-review after I receive the new pair. Definitely don't purchase in your normal size! Received an 8 1/2 and still too small. Giving up on these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, and classic
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I thought they would be. They look great though. I wore these around the house and broke them in before I wore them out. And they still hurt the first day I wore them out. Now they are completely broken in and I can wear them all day. Very sturdy and not flimsily so they will last a long time. And leopard never goes out of style. If you have the patience to break them in they are worth it
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Left horrible blisters, not comfortable. Not very much cushion. Looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great. Feels Okay. Quality Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding flats that are comfortable. My feet need some cushion. These provide decent support for a flat. They are also a classic design that can be dressed up or down. They did rub on my heel the first time I wore them. The second time I wore them I noticed the lining was coming loose around my toes. Shipping (prime) and packaging were great.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not wearable :(
customer_reviews.text: They're very cute & the SOLE is super comfy, but the pressed the top of my foot, at the base of my toes, so I had to return them. The "rim" of the shoe is so firm that there's no "give" & no way I could wear them long enough to break them in, as some others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki W

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy shoe, which although tight at first stretched out after one wear, without giving me sore feet or blisters. Hoping for a long use from these since I feel like I spent a bit of cash on them(As in I hope the sole won't wear down in three months). The fur on the Leopard Pony color does wear off the shoe fairly quickly however, like where your heel rubs against the floor while driving. My right shoe consequently now has a bald spot on the heel from driving a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love the pointy toe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flats! The pointy toe makes the shoe look especially modern and professional. Highly recommend! My only suggestion is to buy heel cushions to stick on the back of the shoe to prevent blisters.
customer_reviews.author: AmoretteR

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great... for what they cost. They are not the most comfortable, but they do have a soft insole. I have a narrow foot and normally wear a 7.5, sometimes 8. But I needed these in an 8. They were snug near the toe joints, and would have given me blisters the first day had I not stuck moleskin on the inside. They've stretched and are comfortable now. They are basic cheapish leather flats. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stein

customer_reviews.title: The black leather flats were pretty comfy, but this leopard one tore the back ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8.5 or a 9, but the 9 was huge on me, so if you go between two sizes, go with the smaller one. The black leather flats were pretty comfy, but this leopard one tore the back of my heal up in the two minutes I wore them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Neva & Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality and fit. I already own the same pair...they are getting worn out and wanted to be sure I had a back up.
customer_reviews.author: ShelleeGee

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: It was too small even when I tried to break into it. I suggest going a size up. The back tore my Achilles up so I suggest wearing some kind of blister protector or band aid when wearing it the first couple of times. Not as comfortable as I expected it to be, probably because it was too small. I think I would have enjoyed it better if I went up a size.
customer_reviews.author: elle2006

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted three months!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I really really did. The rounded pointed toe and memory foam insoles sounded so promising! Unfortunately, when they arrived they were so large that I had to buy heel inserts to keep them from slipping off. After that they were pretty comfortable but only three months later, the toes are so scuffed that they’re barely wearable! The soles are also wearing through. So bummed that I have buy a whole new pair of shoes so soon. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: Heel destroyer
customer_reviews.text: It’s disappointing that these shoes cause so much discomfort to the back of your heels because they are cute! I looked forward to receiving and wearing them but after the first wear, I gave both pairs that I ordered away.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hurlston

customer_reviews.title: Only has name! Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the true to form memory foam inners but not worth the price! Way too expensive for something that didn't last 4 months! I bought 2 pairs (9.5 and a 10) and they were both through within 4 months and I used them for about 8 hours a day 3 days a week whilst at work (desk job)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Baggoo

product_meta.title: Dr. Scholl's Shoes Women's Really Ballet Flat
product_meta.description: A flat with personality. you'll love choosing from all of the colors and textures of this beautiful flat, imagining all of the ways it can update your wardrobe. careful construction makes it a winner for comfort.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Flexible ballet flat with almond toe and memory fit foam insole
